title: Orfeão Madeirense
body:
It made its first public appearance at the 'Dr. Manuel de Arriaga' theater on July 7 and 8, 1921. Its conductor is the distinguished musician and lawyer Dr. Manuel dos Passos Freitas (1921).

It was in the Canary Islands in May 1922, where it was very well received.

1921: First public appearance of the Orfeão Madeirense
